DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the pharmacokinetics and comparative bioavailability of Testosterone absorption in 36 Hypogonadal males after administration of 5 g Testosterone Gel 1.62% to the upper arms/shoulders using an application site rotation or a combination of application sites.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic and Comparative Bioavailability Study of Testosterone Absorption After Administration of Testosterone Gel 1.62% to the Upper Arms/Shoulders Using an Application Site Rotation or a Combination of Application Sites in Hypogonadal Males
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate the pharmacokinetics and comparative bioavailability of Testosterone absorption in 36 Hypogonadal males after administration of 5 g Testosterone Gel 1.62% to the upper arms/shoulders using an application site rotation or a combination of application sites.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1. Hypogonadal males 2. Screening testosterone <300 ng/dL Exclusion Criteria 1. Smokers 2. Previous history of or current or suspected prostate or breast cancer
